## IFileErrorFormattingOptions interface

Provides options for the output message of a file error.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
export interface IFileErrorFormattingOptions
```

## Properties

| Property                                                             | Modifiers | Type                                                          | Description                                                                                                     |
| -------------------------------------------------------------------- | --------- | ------------------------------------------------------------- | --------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------- |
| [format?](./node-core-library.ifileerrorformattingoptions.format.md) |           | [FileLocationStyle](./node-core-library.filelocationstyle.md) | <i>(Optional)</i> The format for the error message. If no format is provided, format 'Unix' is used by default. |
